EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Chicago
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Chicago. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Chicago, IL Tuesday, June 7th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-chicago]]>
Location: 1871 - Merchandise Mart <[[http://www.1871.com/]]> 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza #1212 Chicago, IL 60654 Room: Auditorium Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1871/@41.888369,-87.635364,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x40547b2a8f2c295!8m2!3d41.888369!4d-87.635364]]>
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <[[mailto:psantos@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
